channel.title: CVE Feed for ScienceLogic -- SL 1
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ScienceLogic -- SL 1

item.title: CVE-2022-48604|2024-10-10T12:48:06.441Z -- sciencelogic -- sl%201
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the “logging export” feature of the ScienceLogic SL1 that takes unsanitized user‐controlled input and passes it directly to a SQL query. This allows for the injection of arbitrary SQL before being executed against the database.

item.title: CVE-2022-48603|2024-10-10T12:48:32.241Z -- sciencelogic -- sl%201
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the “message viewer iframe” feature of the ScienceLogic SL1 that takes unsanitized user‐controlled input and passes it directly to a SQL query. This allows for the injection of arbitrary SQL before being executed against the database.

item.title: CVE-2022-48594|2024-10-10T12:49:18.686Z -- sciencelogic -- sl%201
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the “ticket watchers email” feature of the ScienceLogic SL1 that takes unsanitized user‐controlled input and passes it directly to a SQL query. This allows for the injection of arbitrary SQL before being executed against the database.

item.title: CVE-2022-48602|2024-10-10T12:48:53.896Z -- sciencelogic -- sl%201
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability exists in the “message viewer print” feature of the ScienceLogic SL1 that takes unsanitized user‐controlled input and passes it directly to a SQL query. This allows for the injection of arbitrary SQL before being executed against the database.
